entries.name: Shadowclan Weapon
entries: This black steel shortsword has a unique mechanism that allows you to throw the blade half of the weapon, which then separates from the hilt and transforms into a dagger until it is reattached.

Additionally, when you use the Shadowstrike to take the Attack action, you can use a bonus action to cast the spell {@spell Teleport} without expending a spell slot. Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until you complete a short or long rest.
